analysis.description: CryptoDuels.isContract (/unique_chucks/16/0x2931b36154a10bde01373af56623705d128155b5.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

CryptoDuels.duel (/unique_chucks/16/0x2931b36154a10bde01373af56623705d128155b5.sol#161-208) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- isWin = (fakeRandom % (ethPlayer.add(ethOpp))) < ethPlayer (/unique_chucks/16/0x2931b36154a10bde01373af56623705d128155b5.sol#180-183)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/16/0x2931b36154a10bde01373af56623705d128155b5.sol#176-180:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/16/0x2931b36154a10bde01373af56623705d128155b5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.20 (/unique_chucks/16/0x2931b36154a10bde01373af56623705d128155b5.sol#3-5): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newCEO' of Owned.setCEO (/unique_chucks/16/0x2931b36154a10bde01373af56623705d128155b5.sol#43) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newCOO' of Owned.setCOO (/unique_chucks/16/0x2931b36154a10bde01373af56623705d128155b5.sol#47) is not in mixedCase
